alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Shelby, east central Jefferson and southwestern St. Clair Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 330 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barber Motorsports Park, or near Leeds, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eastern Birmingham, Vestavia Hills, Irondale, Leeds, Moody, Shops of Grand River, Alton, Vandiver, Barber Motorsports Park, Lake Purdy, Brook Highland, Grants Mill Road Bridge, Birmingham Race Course, Ruffner Mountain and Camp Winnataska. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
